attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Give  consideration  to a Transport Pollution Prevention Plan.  This plan  would  have  global  as well  as  UK  implications. This plan  on  its  inception  would  lead  to  serious reductions  in  pollution,traffic congestion and  wear and  tear on  the  road traffic  infrastructure.  This plan  could  be  introduced  without need  of  any  extra cost  to the  private  motorist  or  the  road  haulage industry

rejection.details: The title of a petition must be a call to action/summary, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
